# mapButtonSafeAreaLayoutGuide

**Instance Property**

The layout guide that represents the portion of the map template that map buttons don’t obscure.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var mapButtonSafeAreaLayoutGuide: UILayoutGuide { get }
```
